db:info.db:title: Qt SCXML Media Player QML Example (Dynamic)

db:abstract.db:para: A Qt Quick application that sends data to and receives it from a dynamically loaded ECMAScript data model.

db:article.db:para: Media Player QML Example (Dynamic) demonstrates how to access data from a dynamically loaded ECMAScript data model.
The UI is created using Qt Quick.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.

db:section.db:title: Using the ECMAScript Data Model

db:section.db:title: Dynamically Loading the State Machine
db:section.db:para: We link against the Qt SCXML module by adding the following line to the project build files.
db:section.db:programlisting:
find_package(Qt6 COMPONENTS Core Gui Qml Scxml)
target_link_libraries(mediaplayer-qml-dynamic PUBLIC Qt6::Core Qt6::Gui Qt6::Qml Qt6::Scxml )
